snippet: Starbucks, McDonald’s and Subway were the most-frequented restaurants in an analysis by Certify, a firm that manages expense-account software.
abstract: Joe Sharkey On the Road column notes that Starbucks, McDonald’s and Subway are the most-frequented restaurants in an analysis by Certify, firm that manages expense-account software; points out business travelers in a hurry are more likely to grab and go, rather than dine and linger.
lead_paragraph: Starbucks, McDonald’s and Subway were the most-frequented restaurants in an analysis by Certify, a firm that manages expense-account software.

headline.print_headline: Fast Food, Not Fine Dining, Tops Expense Account List
headline.main: Fast Food, Not Fine Dining, Tops Expense Account List
